review: I received my Fire TV Stick a week  early. I installed the unit on my HDMI connection and set it up.No problems with the installation and setup. I looked at the available videos and selectedthe Rome series to watch. I am very pleased with the Fire TV Stick.
author: Lynwood Peterson

review: This is awesome! I love having a remote to choose my viewing options.  This was far better than similar items that require you to use your ipad or other device to stream the videos to your tv.  It is also super easy to install and use.
author: LoveLay "LoveLay"

review: Has trouble picking up my Wi-Fi. Not sure it's very powerful.
author: Kath

review: Amazing. This is so fast and what an easy way to see everything. I love it and recommend it HIGHLY!
author: M. A. San Giovanni

review: Had it 3 days, so far we love it!
author: Glenna L. Dunagan

review: Easy to set up, easy to use.  We are going to enjoy.
author: Wayne
